something_you_did_other_reason_details:
Had difficulty in contacting the candidate to arrange an interview date.

Had to email to get a response and arrange date. Took a few weeks to get a date arranged, being almost full with people who were eager to arrange, it is important that we know the person is keen to be gain their QTS.
candidate_behaviour_what_to_improve:
Understand that Teacher Training is not just a course, like University or College and arranging interview days takes time, as interview panel has to be arranged.
Be prompt in responses and show you want the position.
performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
Research.
Develop a better knowledge of the role of a teacher and requirements of teaching a lesson.
